text: Flowers are  sites of sexual reproduction morphological and embryological marvels,  always solitary (not in inflorescences)  of aesthetic/social/religious value.  Choose the correct combination.

options.d: I, II, III and IVAns: AHint/Explanation:The text states flowers are morphological/embryological marvels and sites of sexual reproduction, and also have aesthetic/social/religious value. They can be borne on inflorescences, so (III) is false. LEVEL - 1
